instance_template: location(l1). location(l2). truck(t1). package(p1). fuelcost(5,l1,l2). at(t1,l1,0). at(p1,l1,0). fuel(t1,10,0). goal(p1,l2). step(1..10).
generator:
{ occurs(load(P,T,L),S) : package(P), truck(T), location(L); occurs(unload(P,T,L),S) : package(P), truck(T), location(L); occurs(drive(T,L1,L2),S) : truck(T), location(L1), location(L2), fuelcost(_,L1,L2) } <= 1 :- step(S).
at(P,L,S) :- occurs(unload(P,T,L),S).
at(T,L2,S) :- occurs(drive(T,L1,L2),S).
in(P,T,S) :- occurs(load(P,T,L),S).
fuel(T,F2,S) :- occurs(drive(T,L1,L2),S), fuel(T,F1,S-1), fuelcost(D,L1,L2), F2 = F1 - D.
at(O,L,S) :- at(O,L,S-1), not moved(O,S), step(S).
moved(P,S) :- occurs(load(P,_,_),S).
moved(P,S) :- occurs(unload(P,_,_),S).
moved(T,S) :- occurs(drive(T,_,_),S).
in(P,T,S) :- in(P,T,S-1), not moved(P,S), step(S).
fuel(T,F,S) :- fuel(T,F,S-1), not fuel_consumed(T,S), step(S).
fuel_consumed(T,S) :- occurs(drive(T,_,_),S).

hard_constraints.description: Drive requires truck at start location.
All goals must be satisfied at final step.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- goal(P,L), not at(P,L,S), step(S), not step(S+1).
